doc.field: Six color photographs shot in February 1980, at the Cuernavaca, Mexico, home of Mollie Steimer and Senya Fleshin, during filming for Pacific Street Films' 1982 documentary, "Anarchism in America". Photographs are of Mollie Steimer, Senya Fleshin, and Spanish anarchists Proudhon and Carmen Carbo.
